text: @AdamParkhomenko It's sad.  However, maybe they'll all get COVID-19 & we'll be rid of the morons.  Just fewer of the moronic Trump supporters to vote for that idiot in Nov.  Just be sure to avoid them & wear masks, when anywhere near the dumbells.
